title: Is the Scum Worthy of Whitewashing? - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Eidetic Memory   Genius Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Mysterious Family Background   Mysterious Past   Overpowered Protagonist   Proactive Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   System Administrator   Tragic Past   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Wealthy Characters   World Hopping

description:
Xu Du was bound to a “anti-whitewashing” system, which shuttles through the route of various whitewashing scum. The task is to stop the scum man from “washing white”, and guard the girls who are abused and cheated by the scum man.

The system: As a privilege of the executor, you can make a request for your shuttle identity.

Xu Du: Rich, can wave, the card is big enough.

So he became rich, can wave, rowdy enough …… cannon fodder.

In a word: A story of cannon fodder stopping a variety of white washing scum.>
